title: The Blue and Gold Dress
summary: Ah yes, the infamous blue/black or white/gold dress. What if I told you I see neither of those color combinations?
long_summary: Ah yes, the infamous blue/black or white/gold dress. What if I told you I see neither of those color combinations? Turns out I see blue/gold, basically a compromise of the two most popular views. And, I think it has to to with me being a web developer.
